description: Japanese title: Ishida no Kirifuda, Tamashii o Kirisaku Mono (石田の切り札、魂を切り裂くもの)
name: Ishida's Trump Card, Seele Schneider

description:
Japanese title: Kyojin no Uwan, Akuma no Sawan (巨人の右腕、悪魔の左腕)

Pesche's unusual ability allows Uryu to damage Cirucci. Cirucci releases her Zanpakuto and attacks the two until she has them cornered.
name: Right Arm of the Giant, Left Arm of the Devil

description:
Japanese title: Sado Yasutora Shisu! Orihime no Namida (茶渡泰虎死す！織姫の涙)

Chad faces the Privaron Espada Gantenbainne and survives many of his fierce attacks. Chad reveals the power of his right arm, Brazo Derecho Del Gigante.
name: Yasutora Sado Dies! Orihime's Tears

description:
Japanese title: uigon - Kokoro wa Koko ni... (遺言、心はここに…)

Nnoitora, one of the Espada, suddenly appears and defeats Chad in a single strike.
name: Testament, Your Heart is Right Here...

description:
Japanese title: Zankoku na Arankaru, Urukiora no Chōhatsu (残酷な破面、ウルキオラの挑発)

Aaroniero uses his ability to utilize the Spiritual Pressure of the Hollows that he devours.
name: The Cruel Arrancar, Ulquiorra's Provocation

description:
Japanese title: Warau Zaeruaporo, Renji Hōi Ami Kansei (笑うザエルアポロ、恋次包囲網完成)

Renji meets Espada Number Eight, Szayel Aporro Grantz. Renji attempts to use his Bankai but fails because of restrictions that Szayel Aporro has placed on the room they are in that limit Renji’s power.
name: Syazel Aporro Laughs, the Net Trapping Renji is Complete

description:
Japanese title: Shinigami to Kuinshī, Kyōki to no Tatakai (死神とクインシー、狂気との戦い)

Ichigo and Ulquiorra begin to fight in the depths of Las Noches. Ichigo fights Ulquiorra at full power right from the start, using his Bankai and even his Hollowfication.
name: Shinigami and Quincy, the Battle with Madness

description:
Japanese title: Ishida no Sakusen, Nijūbyō no Kōbō (石田の作戦、20秒の攻防)

Lolly and Menoly are jealous that Aizen is treating Orihime well, so they go to Orihime's room to harass her. Orihime tries to stay strong, but they are relentless.
name: Ishida's Strategy, 20-Second Offense and Defense

description:
Japanese title: Satsui Futtō! Kanki no Gurimujō (殺意沸騰！歓喜のグリムジョー)

Szayel Aporro has analyzed Uryu’s and Renji's Spiritual Pressures and has sealed away most of their abilities.
name: The Murderous Intent Boils! The Joyful Grimmjow

description:
Japanese title: Shiryoku vs. Shiryoku! Horōkashita Ichigo (一死力VS死力！ホロウ化した一護)

Grimmjow takes Orihime without permission and forces her to heal Ichigo. He wants to settle things with Ichigo while he's in his best condition.
name: Desperate Effort vs. Desperate Effort! Hollowfied Ichigo

description:
Japanese title: Ketchaku no Toki, Gurimujō no Saigo (決着の時、グリムジョーの最後)

A wild battle begins between Ichigo and Grimmjow. As swords and Spiritual Pressures clash, Grimmjow unleashes his strongest Cero, the Gran Rey Cero.
name: The Moment of Conclusion, the End of Grimmjow

description:
Japanese title: Shin Taichō Tōjō! Sono Namae wa Amagai Shūsuke (新隊長登場！その名前は天貝繍助)

Ichigo hits Grimmjow with a mighty blow. Grimmjow is about to collapse, but he grabs Zangetsu and pulls himself up.
name: The New Captain Appears! His Name is Amagai Shuusuke

description:
Japanese title: Shin Tenkai, Kiken na Tenkōsei Arawaru! (新展開、危険な転校生現る！)

A new captain joins Squad 3, taking the place of the rebel Gin Ichimaru. His name is Shusuke Amagai.
name: New Development, the Dangerous Transfer Student Appears!

description:
Japanese title: Tsukiyo no Shitō, Nazo no Shikaku to Zanpakutō (月夜の死闘、謎の刺客と斬魄刀)

In the middle of the night, a strange Senkaimon opens in Karakura Town, and a mysterious team of three arrives in the World of the Living.
name: Desperate Struggle Under the Moonlit Night, the Mysterious Assassin and Zanpakutō

description:
Japanese title: Kenryū, Sakimidareru Beni no Hana (犬龍、咲き乱れる紅の華)

A mysterious team of three transfers into Ichigo’s class. Their names are Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, Kenryu, and Enryu. Rurichiyo acts like a princess, and Kenryu and Enryu obsessively guard her surroundings.
name: Kenryu, the Profusion of Blooming Crimson Flowers

description:
Japanese title: Kibune Shutsujin! Fukiareru Reppū (貴船出陣！吹き荒れる烈風)

Ichigo and Rukia assume the responsibility of being Rurichiyo’s bodyguard. It is Rurichiyo’s first time in the World of the Living, and she asks Ichigo to teach her about everything she sees.
name: Kibune Goes to War! The Violent Wind that Rages

description:
Japanese title: Kyoaku no Tōjō! Kasumiōji-ka no Yami (巨悪の登場！霞大路家の闇)

Since welcoming Shusuke Amagai as the new captain, Squad 3 has been hard at work. But the duties Shusuke assigns them are tasks that one couldn’t imagine a Soul Reaper doing.
name: The Appearance of the Great Evil! The Darkness in the House of Kasumiōji

description:
Japanese title: Kagami no Kyōkai o Yabure! Toraware no Ichigo (鏡の境界を破れ！捕らわれの一護)

One morning, Rurichiyo suddenly disappears. Kenryu finds some indication that leads him to believe that she used the Kasumiohji Clan’s private Senkaimon to return to the Soul Society.
name: Break the Mirror's Boundary! Ichigo's Captivity

description:
Japanese title: Fukushū no Shikaku, Nerawareta Ichigo (復讐の刺客、狙われた一護)

Ichigo returns to the World of the Living, and he draws up a countermeasure at Kisuke Urahara’s shop. When everyone leaves Urahara’s shop, they come across Hanza Nukui, the head of an assassination squad.
name: The Revenging Assassin, Ichigo is Targeted

description:
Japanese title: Kaiki! Katana o Kuu Ansatsusha (怪奇！刀を喰う暗殺者)

Hanza Nukui has misjudged the power of Ichigo and his friends, and has failed to assassinate Rurichiyo. He forms a unit of assassins, armed with powerful Bakkouto swords, and prepares to go back to the World of the Living.
name: Mystery! The Sword-Consuming Assassin

description:
Japanese title: Gyakuten no Rukia! Bōsōsuru Yaiba (逆転のルキア、暴走する刀)

Hanza Nukui and his team of assassins, armed with Bakkoutos, arrive in the World of the Living, and they challenge Ichigo and the others to fight. Jinnai Douko appears before Rurichiyo wielding a Bakkouto.
name: The Reversal of Rukia, the Rampaging Blade

description:
Japanese title: Miserareta Akumu, Kagami no Naka no Ichigo (見せられた悪夢、鏡の中の一護)

The respective battles of Rukia, Uryu, and Chad continue. Jinnai Douko becomes one with his Bakkouto, Retsurai, and keeps attacking. Rukia has a tough battle against Jinnai, whose whole body transforms into a weapon.
name: The Nightmare Which is Shown, Ichigo's Inside the Mirror

description:
Japanese title: Tairitsu!? Amagai VS Gotei Jūsantai (対立!?天貝VS護廷十三隊)

Hanza Nukui uses his Bakkouto, Saiga’s weak point, to act as a trap for Ichigo. Ichigo ends up getting caught in Hanza’s scheme, an expanse of mirrors. The mirrors take the memories of the captive and turn them into nightmares.
name: Confrontation!? Amagai vs. Gotei 13

description:
Japanese title: Hime no Ketsui, Kanashiki Hanayome (姫の決意、哀しき花嫁)

At a captain’s meeting in the Soul Society, Shusuke Amagai proposes to the Thirteen Court Guard Squads that they train directly with the squads.
name: The Princess' Decision, the Sorrowful Bride

description:
Japanese title: Nibantai Shutsugeki! Hōisareta Ichigo (二番隊出撃！包囲された一護)

Ichigo and his friends have narrowly escaped Hanza Nukui’s team’s attacks. But Uryu and Chad have been inundated with the Spirit Energy of Bakkoutos, and Orihime’s healing power doesn’t seem to be working.
name: The 2nd Division Sorties! Ichigo is Surrounded

description:
Japanese title: Amagai no Jitsuryoku, Zanpakutō Kaihō！ (天貝の実力、斬魄刀解放！)

Rurichiyo has gone back to the Soul Society to take back control of the Kasumiohji Clan. Ichigo, Rukia, Kenryu, and Enryu follow her through the Senkaimon, and they barge in on Rurichiyo and Shu’s wedding at the Kasumiohji palace.
name: Amagai's True Strength, the Released Zanpakuto!

description:
Japanese title: Ugokidashita Yami! Kibune no Shōtai (動き出した闇！貴船の正体)

Ichigo and Rukia are being chased down by the Thirteen Court Guard Squads after sabotaging Rurichiyo and Shu’s wedding and taking Shu hostage.
name: The Darkness Which Moves! Kibune's True Colors

description:
Japanese title: Kira to Kibune, Sanbantai no Kōbō (吉良と貴船、三番隊の攻防)

After Shu Kannogi tearfully tells Shusuke Amagai how he feels, Shusuke loses his feelings of ill will towards Ichigo and instead decides to help in their search for Rurichiyo.
name: Kira and Kibune, Offense and Defense of 3rd Division

description:
Japanese title: Kōri to Honō! Amagai VS Hitsugaya no Gekitō (氷と炎！天貝VS日番谷の激闘)

The Soul Reapers stop chasing after Ichigo for the time being and focus on restoring order in the Seireitei.
name: Ice and Flame! Fierce Fight of Amagai vs. Hitsugaya

description:
Japanese title: Shutsugeki Shirei! Kasumiōji-ka o Seiatsu seyo (出撃指令！霞大路家を制圧せよ)

The intense battle between Izuru Kira and Makoto Kibune continues at Squad Three’s training facility.
name: Sortie Orders! Suppress the House of Kasumiōji

description:
Japanese title: Ichigo Gekido! Ansatsusha no Himitsu (一護激怒！暗殺者の秘密)

At the Head Captain’s command, all the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads break into the Kasumiohji Clan’s palace at once.
name: Ichigo Rages! The Assassin's Secret

description:
Japanese title: Kettō! Amagai VS Ichigo (決闘！天貝VS一護)

The battle at the Kasumiohji Clan’s palace between the Thirteen Court Guard Squads and the Kasumiohji Clan’s assassins continues.
name: Duel! Amagai vs. Ichigo

description:
Japanese title: Ochita Shinigami no Hokori (堕ちた死神の誇り)

The chaos in the Kasumiohji Clan was all a scheme formulated by Shusuke Amagai. Shusuke joined the Thirteen Court Guard Squads in order to avenge his father’s death at the hands of Head Captain Yamamoto.
name: The Fallen Shinigami's Pride

description:
Japanese title: Weko Mundo Hen, Saikai! (ウェコムンド編、再会！)

Shusuke Amagai wields both a Bakkouto, which seals the powers of Soul Reapers, and his Bankai, Raika Gouenkaku. Ichigo defends against Shusuke's Bankai while Hollowfied and counterattacks with his most powerful Getsugatensho.
name: Hueco Mundo Chapter, Restart!

description:
Japanese title: Kyōen, Zaeruaporo Gekijō (恐宴、ザエルアポロ劇場)

The Hueco Mundo Arc, which was put on hold for the New Captain Shusuke Amagai Arc, resumes.
name: The Frightening Banquet, Szayelaporro Theater

description:
Japanese title: Neru no Himitsu, Kyonyū Bijo Sansen!? (ネルの秘密、 巨乳美女参戦!?)

Uryu and Renji thought they had escaped, but they find themselves back at Szayelaporro's palace.
name: Nel's Secret, A Busty Beauty Joins the Battle!?

description:
Japanese title: Teikō Funō, Kyōfu no Ningyōgeki (抵抗不能、恐怖の人形劇)

After finding Nel hiding in the shadow of a rock, Nnoitora tells Ichigo's group that Nel is actually a former Espada.
name: The Irresistable, Puppet Show of Terror

description:
Japanese title: Nerieru no Kako (ネリエルの過去)

Uryu and Renji continue fighting their clones. But no matter how many times they beat them, the clones turn back into liquid, multiply, and revive.
name: Neliel's Past

description:
Japanese title: Kyūkyoku Gattai! Pesshe no Honki (究極合体！ペッシェの本気)

Nnoitora and Nelliel continue to battle. They are nearly equal in strength. The two of them used to fight side by side as fellow Espadas.
name: The Ultimate Union! Pesche's Seriousness

description:
Japanese title: Sanzen! Saikyō Shinigami Gundan Tōjō (参戦！最強死神軍団登場)

Nelliel regains her memory, and Pesche and Dondochakka realize that she is going to give her all in the battle against Nnoitora. In order to go fight with Nelliel, Pesche and Dondochakka summon all their strength.
name: Joining the Battle! The Strongest Soul Reaper Army Appears

description:
Japanese title: Byakuya Bankai, Shizukanaru Ikari (白哉卍解、静かなる怒り)

Just when Nelliel and Nnoitora's battle is about to come to an end, something unexpected happens to Nelliel's body. Ichigo's group find themselves in a sticky situation yet again.
name: Byakuya's Bankai, the Quiet Anger

description:
Japanese title: Futari no Kagakusha, Mayuri no Wana (2人の科学者、マユリの罠)

Byakuya visits Rukia, who is unconscious after being injured in the battle against Aaroniero Arruruerie. Zommari Rureaux, Espada Number 7, happens to be there, attempting to finish her off.
name: The Two Scientists, Mayuri's Trap

description:
Japanese title: Seitan, Yomigaeru Zaeruaporo (聖誕、蘇るザエルアポロ)

Zommari's technique, "Amor," takes control over anything its eyes gaze upon. He uses this power to control Rukia's body and use her as a shield.
name: Holy Birth, The Resurrected Szayel Aporro

description:
Japanese title: Saikō no Karada!? Noitora o Kire (最硬の体!? ノイトラを斬れ)

Szayelaporro is exasperated when his powers don't work at all against Mayuri Kurotsuchi, and he ends up being enveloped by Mayuri's Konjiki Ashisogijizo. Just then, something happens to Nemu, who was being held hostage.
name: The Hardest Body!? Cut Down Nnoitra

description:
Japanese title: Noitora Kaihō! Zōshokushita Ude (ノイトラ開放！増殖した腕)

Szayelaporro used his prisoner Nemu as a medium to come back to life. However, Nemu's body is permeated with the new medicine that Mayuri developed. Szayelaporro experiences the dreadful effects of the medicine himself.
name: Nnoitra Released! Multiplying Arms

description:
Japanese title: Gekitō Ketchaku! Saikyō wa Dare da (激動決着！最強は誰だ)

Kenpachi goes after Nnoitora's eye and pierces his eye patch, but the eye patch was hiding a dreadful secret.
name: Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Who's the Strongest

description:
Japanese title: Karakura-chō ni Shūketsu! Aizen Tai Shinigami (空座町に集結！藍染対死神)

When Kenpachi's eye patch comes off, releasing his Spiritual Pressure and true strength, Nnoitora invokes his sword attack, Santa Teresa.
name: Karakura Town Gathers! Aizen Versus Shinigami

description:
Japanese title: Ichigo no Seppuku Settoku Sakusen (一護の切腹説得大作戦☆)

Nnoitora has never shown any mercy to his opponents, and he has always finished them off. Nnoitora's reason for fighting has always been purely to fight. He has been fighting and becoming stronger, hoping to someday die in battle.
name: Ichigo's Seppuku Persuasion Strategy ☆

description:
Japanese title: Doki! Horō Darake no Kemari Taikai (ドキ！虚だらけの蹴鞠大会)

Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, who supposedly became the head of the family, goes off to the World of the Living by herself after getting in a fight with Kenryu.
name: Thump! A Kemari Tournament Filled with Hollows

description:
Japanese title: Kako Hen Kaishi! Hyakujū Nen Mae no Shinjitsu (過去編開始！110年前の真実)

Rurichiyo and Kenryu's fight was over how to revitalize the Kasumiohji Clan. Rurichiyo is concerned about the low spirits of her people, and she wants to host a soccer tournament.
name: The Past Chapter Begins! The Truth from 110 Years Ago

description:
Japanese title: Jūnibantai Shin Taichō, Urahara Kisuke (十二番隊新隊長、浦原喜助)

In the Soul Society 110 years ago, the Thirteen Court Guard Squads are made up of unfamiliar faces. The captain of Squad Five is the masked Visored, Shinji Hirako who currently resides in the World of the Living.
name: 12th Division's New Captain, Kisuke Urahara

description:
Japanese title: Aizen to Tensai Shōnen (藍染と天才少年)

Kisuke Urahara replaces the newly promoted Kirio Hikifune as captain of Squad Twelve. Hiyori Sarugaki, lieutenant of Squad Twelve, cannot hide her dissatisfaction with the new captain.
name: Aizen and the Genius Boy

description:
Japanese title: Muguruma Kyūbantai, Shutsudōse Yo (六車九番隊、出動せよ)

Kisuke takes Hiyori to the Special underground Confinement Unit inside the Squad Two barracks. Nicknamed the Maggot's Nest, this place imprisons enlisted Thirteen Court Guard Squad members whose beliefs or actions have been deemed dangerous.
name: Muguruma 9th Division, Moves Out

description:
Japanese title: Hiyori Shisu? Higeki no Hajimari (ひよ里死す? 悲劇の始まり)

Nine years have passed since Kisuke Urahara was appointed captain of Squad Twelve. Bizarre deaths start to occur in the Rukon District where people disappear, leaving only their clothes behind.
name: Hiyori dies? The Beginning of Tragedy

description:
Japanese title: Uragiri! An'yaku no Aizen (裏切り！暗躍の藍染)

Kensei Muguruma's and Mashiro Kuna's Spiritual Pressure disappears. The Seireitei deems this a dire situation. Kisuke Urahara, who sent Hiyori to Squad Nine, volunteers to go to the scene of their disappearance.
name: Betrayal! Aizen's Secret Maneuvers

description:
Japanese title: Hirako o Sukue! Aizen VS Urahara (平子を救え！藍染VS浦原)

At Squad Nine's camp, Shinji Hirako and the others run into Kensei Muguruma, who is donning a strange mask. Kensei starts to attack them, and he is too powerful to stop even with all of them combined.
name: Rescue Hirako! Aizen vs. Urahara

description:
Japanese title: Konsō Deka Karakuraizā Tanjō (魂葬刑事カラクライザー誕生)

Sosuke Aizen suddenly appears in front of Shinji Hirako and the others. He draws his sword on Shinji, who is agonized by his Hollow transformation and cannot move his body at will.
name: The Konso Cop Karakuraiser is Born

description:
Japanese title: Karakuraizā Saigo no Hi (カラクライザー最後の日)

Ichigo and his friends leave Karakura Town with the intent of bringing Orihime back, and they continue fighting in Hueco Mundo. Nevertheless, Hollows continue to appear in the World of the Living.
name: Karakuraiser's Last Day

description:
Japanese title: Karakura-chō o Mamore! Shinigami Sōtōjō (空座町を護れ！死神総登場)

Kisuke Urahara has forced Kon to transform into Konso Cop Karakurizer. As Karakurizer, Kon has some powerful allies.
name: Defend Karakura Town! Entire Appearance of the Shinigami

description:
Japanese title: eiei! Yonnin no Shinigami (精鋭！四人の死神)

Sosuke Aizen brings Kaname Tosen, Gin Ichimaru, and the Espadas Stark, Barragan, and Halibel to the World of the Living on a mission to destroy Karakura Town. The Espadas stand before the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.
name: Elite! The Four Shinigami

description:
Japanese title: Utsukushiki Koakuma Sharurotte (美しき小悪魔シャルロッテ)

The Head Captain expected the battle to take place in Karakura Town, so he fights to keep it from being destroyed. He places pillars in four corners of the town to switch the real Karakura Town with a replica that was made in the Soul Society.
name: Beautiful Little Devil Charlotte

description:
Japanese title: Kira, Zetsubō no Naka de no Tatakai (吉良、絶望の中での戦い)

Shuhei, Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Izuru start fighting against the Fracci贸nes that Barragan deployed.
name: Kira, The Battle Within Despair

description:
Japanese title: Hisagi Shikai! Sono na wa... (檜佐木始解！その名は…)

Yumichika is trapped inside Chuhlhourne’s briar of darkness. Learning he cannot be seen from the outside world, Yumichika unveils his Zanpakuto’s true power.
name: Hisagi's Shikai! The Name Is...

description:
Japanese title: Ikkaku Taoreru! Shinigami no Kiki (一角倒れる！死神の危機)

Shuhei Hisagi battles Findorr Calius, who has increased his strength level equal to that of a squad lieutenant by shattering his own mask. Shuhei, overwhelmed by the enemy’s power, is forced to stay on the defensive.
name: Ikkaku Falls! The Shinigami's Crisis

description:
Japanese title: Zenmen Taiketsu! Shinigami VS Esupāda (全面対決！死神VS十刃)

Shuhei, Izuru, Yumichika, and Ikkaku fight to guard the four pillars used to switch the real Karakura Town with a fake one.
name: The Full Showdown! Shinigami vs. Espada

description:
Japanese title: Saikyō Taggu!? Soifon & Ōmaeda (最凶タッグ!?砕蜂&大前田)

The Soul Reapers succeed in defending the four pillars from being destroyed, preventing the real Karakura Town from returning to the World of the Living.
name: The Most Evil Tag!? Soi Fon & Ōmaeda

description:
Japanese title: Kyōi no Nikutai! Jio Kaihō (驚異の肉体！ジオ解放)

Soi Fon and Marechiyo Omaeda are to take on Ggio and Nirgge. Soi Fon confidently goes after Ggio, but Ggio puts up a good fight.
name: A Miraculous Body! Ggio Releases

description:
Japanese title: 3 vs 1 no Sentō! Pinchi no Rangiku (3vs1の戦闘！ピンチの乱菊)

Ggio, who released his Hollow power, is overpowering Soi Fon. Marechiyo Omaeda realizes that Soi Fon is in a dire situation and comes to help her.
name: 3 vs 1 Battle! Rangiku's Crisis

description:
Japanese title: Fukutaichō Zenmetsu! Kyōfu no Yōjū (副隊長全滅！恐怖の妖獣)

Rangiku battles Halibel’s three Fracciónes, Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun. She attacks with her Haineko, but even that is not very effective against the three opponents.
name: Vice-Captains Annihilated! The Terrifying Demonic Beast

description:
Japanese title: Gekitō Shūketsu? Aratanaru Tatakai e! (激闘終結？新たなる戦いへ！)

Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun release their Resurrección forms. In addition, they combine their left arms to create a mysterious monster called Ayon.
name: Fierce Fighting Concludes? Towards a New Battle!

description:
Japanese title: Wandafuru Erā (ワンダフル・エラー)

The Soul Reapers are defeated one after another at the hands of Ayon. Seeing this, Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto decides to get involved.
name: Wonderful Error

description:
Japanese title: Natsu da! Umi da! Mizugisai!! (夏だ！海だ！水着祭!!)

Mizuiro starts at Karakura First High School without any great expectations or ambitions.
name: Summer! Sea! Swimsuit Festival!!

description: Japanese title: Tamashii no Sakebi? Zura Shinigami Tanjō! (魂の叫び？ヅラ死神誕生！)
name: Cry of the Soul? The Rug Shinigami is Born!

description: Japanese title: Aratanaru Teki! Zanpakutō Jittaika (新たなる敵！斬魄刀実体化)
name: A New Enemy! The Materialization of Zanpakutō

description: Japanese title: Byakuya, Sakura to Tomo ni Kiyu (白哉、桜と共に消ゆ)
name: Byakuya, Disappearing with the Cherry Blossoms

description: Japanese title: Sode no Shirayuki tai Rukia! Kokoro no Madoi (袖白雪VSルキア！心の惑い)
name: Sode no Shirayuki vs. Rukia! Confused Heart

description: Japanese title: Teki to Natta Zangetsu (敵となった斬月)
name: Zangetsu Becomes an Enemy

description: Japanese title: Renji Kyōgaku!? Futari no Zabimaru (恋次驚愕!? 2人の蛇尾丸)
name: Renji Surprised?! The Two Zabimarus

description: Japanese title: Gekitotsu! Hisagi tai Kazeshini (激突！檜佐木VS風死)
name: Clash! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini

description: Japanese title: Hanate! Aratanaru Getsuga Tenshō (放て！新たなる月牙天衝)
name: Release! The New Getsuga Tenshō

description: Japanese title: Soifon, Zanpakutō o Hōi se yo (砕蜂、斬魄刀を包囲せよ)
name: Soi Fon, Surrounding the Zanpakutō

description: Japanese title: Yūjō? Ken'o? Haineko to Tobiume (友情？嫌悪？灰猫＆飛梅)
name: Friendship? Hatred? Haineko & Tobiume

description: Japanese title: Mezame yo Hyōrinmaru! Hitsugaya Gekitō (目覚めよ氷輪丸！日番谷激闘)
name: The Awakening Hyōrinmaru! Hitsugaya's Fierce Fight

description: Japanese title: Uragiri no Byakuya (裏切りの白哉)
name: Byakuya's Betrayal

description: Japanese title: Hokori no Tame ni! Byakuya tai Renji (誇りのために！白哉VS恋次)
name: For the Sake of Pride! Byakuya vs. Renji

description: Japanese title: Shinigami to Zanpakutō, Sōshutsugeki (死神＆斬魄刀、総出撃)
name: Shinigami and Zanpakutō, Total Sortie
